Uses of Package
elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization

  • Packages that use elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization 
    Package Description
    elki.application.experiments
    Packaged experiments to make them easy to reproduce.
    elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization
    Initialization strategies for k-means.
    elki.clustering.kmedoids
    K-medoids clustering (PAM).
    elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization  
    elki.clustering.silhouette
    Silhouette clustering algorithms.
    elki.index.idistance
    iDistance is a distance based indexing technique, using a reference points embedding.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.application.experiments 
    Class Description
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.clustering.kmeans.initialization 
    Class Description
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.clustering.kmedoids 
    Class Description
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization 
    Class Description
    AlternateRefinement
    Meta-Initialization for k-medoids by performing one (or many) k-means-style iteration.
    BUILD
    PAM initialization for k-means (and of course, for PAM).
    GreedyG
    Initialization method for k-medoids that combines the Greedy (PAM BUILD) with "alternate" refinement steps.
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
    KMedoidsKMedoidsInitialization
    Initialize k-medoids with k-medoids, for methods such as PAMSIL.
    This could also be used to initialize, e.g., PAM with CLARA.
    LAB
    Linear approximative BUILD (LAB) initialization for FastPAM (and k-means).
    ParkJun
    Initialization method proposed by Park and Jun.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.clustering.silhouette 
    Class Description
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
  • Classes in elki.clustering.kmedoids.initialization used by elki.index.idistance 
    Class Description
    KMedoidsInitialization
    Interface for initializing K-Medoids.
